name: 苏·布尔库·科斯昆
name_full: 苏·布尔库·科斯昆 Su Burcu Coşkun
introduction: At the age of five, she begun acting as child actor. She is studying in theatre department of Pera Fine Arts High School. Her breakthrough came with the character "Zeynep" can read minds in popular fantasy series "Sana Bir Sir Verecegim" alongside Demet Ozdemir, Ekin Koc, Burak Can, Berk Cankat. She played in many popular series and films. Her some popular long term series are comedy series "Ask Yeniden", drama series "Kuzgun". She received critical acclaim about her performance at series "Kirmizi Oda".At the age of fifteen, She has leading role in youth series "Kardeslerim".
